name: RAGDOLLS N EXPLOSIONS
description:
Run around and blow stuff up in this explosive physics-based game! In RAGDOLLS AND EXPLOSIONS, all your task is to not die and get as many kills as possible.

Most objects in the levels have physics applied. Take advantage of  the surrounding explosives to defeat the enemies.

Collect cash by killing as many enemies as you can. Spend that cash to buy better classes, or maps!

Your task : Stay alive and kill as many enemies as you can. You can try doing cool tricks while in-air and in slow motion which i think is really fun to do!

If you are feeling bored and want some action, then what are you waiting for? Download now!

Also, believe me or not, the game actually has a story to it.

Have a spare dollar or two? Why not consider donating for more games just like this(also to speed up the making process), every dollar would be extremely useful for me.

Game also available on Gamejolt - Gamejolt page

How to unlock all classes (for windows):
1. Purchase the "Unlock all classes" save file

2. Go to files, and type "%appdata%" on the top

3. It will send you to roaming of AppData folder, go back to the app data

4. Open LocalLow of AppData 

5. In LocalLow, go to DoubleTornado -> RagdollsNExplosions.

6. Replace the "HaHaSaveFileGoBrrr"(Yes, thats how i named the save file) with the purchased one

7. When you launch the game, you should have all classes unlocked
NOTE : The highscore will be reset to 33 and your current cash will be about 8000
